content.en: Efficient modular computations: Researchers have been exploring ways to make computations involving large numbers more efficient. They have developed algorithms that can perform modular multiplication and exponentiation faster, reducing the number of operations required. These algorithms utilize techniques such as Montgomery reduction, modified Booth's algorithm, and complex arithmetic to achieve faster results.
content.da: Effektive modulære beregninger: Forskere har undersøgt måder at gøre beregninger, der involverer store tal, mere effektive. De har udviklet algoritmer, der kan udføre modulær multiplikation og eksponentiering hurtigere, hvilket reducerer antallet af nødvendige operationer. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som Montgomery-reduktion, modificeret Booths algoritme og kompleks aritmetik for at opnå hurtigere resultater.
